column1: 1594315305228066816,1594315305228066816@harryisamiIf It’s kind of funny how when H released Boyfriends got forbid someone imply it’s about L and their struggles, no, it’s H singing about himself from the outsider’s perspective, but L makes fun of H in his songs because obviously she’s a diva and a bit spoilt. https://t.co/gKd2tPUnQR t_end
